title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip          Reservations and Fee Waivers   Educational visits may qualify for a waiver of entrance fees. Applications for fee waivers must be submitted in writing. The application can be requested by phone at 575-278-2201 x 231, e-mail, or by writing Park Ranger, Capulin Volcano National Monument, P.O. Box 40, Des Moines, New Mexico 88418.  Fee Waiver Application               School children on a field trip view the Raton-Clayton Volcanic Field from the top of Capulin Volcano. An NPS Photo
